title: Šaľa Stadium
text: The Šaľa Stadion is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> in <a href="%C5%A0a%C4%BEa">Šaľa</a>, <a href="Slovakia">Slovakia</a>. Currently, it is mostly used for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="FK%20Slovan%20Duslo%20%C5%A0a%C4%BEa">FK Slovan Duslo Šaľa</a>. The stadium holds 1,126 people.
